faq_q1: How can I order a scooter?
faq_a1: You choose the scooter you like through the platform or you can order from our partner stores in the area near you. You enter your contact information to leave an order. Within 24 hours, our specialists will contact you and formalize the order.
faq_q2: What are the payment methods? Is there an option for installment payments?
faq_a2: Payment can be made in cash, by bank card, or with the help of partner financial organizations. There is also an option for installment payment (nasiya). Payment terms may vary depending on the selected model and partners.
faq_q3: How many months is the warranty and what does it include?
faq_a3: A warranty of typically 6 to 12 months is provided for scooters. The warranty covers the engine, electronic parts, and major technical malfunctions. Mechanical damage and cases of incorrect use are not included in the warranty.
faq_q4: Are service and spare parts available?
faq_a4: Yes, service and original spare parts are available. Technical service is provided at partner service centers. Necessary spare parts are delivered quickly.
faq_q5: What documents are provided? Will there be help with registration?
faq_a5: A contract, warranty card, and technical documents are provided at the time of purchase. If necessary, advice and practical help with scooter registration are also provided.
faq_q6: How does return or cancellation work?
faq_a6: The order can be cancelled or the product can be returned within the specified period. Return conditions are carried out in accordance with the product condition and current rules. You can get detailed information from our specialists.
